subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Because Andy Pettitte is supposed to start the second game of the season in 11 days and is supposed to be one of the anchors of the rotation, his latest injury could mushroom into a problem.
snippet: Because Andy Pettitte is supposed to start the second game of the season in 11 days and is supposed to be one of the anchors of the rotation, his latest injury could mushroom into a problem.
